## UNSTABLE_ReactComponentTracker variable

Experimental component that tracks the render lifecycle of its children and reports a duration vital named `reactComponentRender`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
UNSTABLE_ReactComponentTracker: ({ name: componentName, children, }: {
    name: string;
    children?: React.ReactNode;
}) => React.JSX.Element
```
